Title: Farewell party for Shri R. Natarajan, IAS
Description: Sri Natarajan's term as Registrar ended in 1965. A farewell party was organised in his honour in April. On this occassion he gave a speech titled 'A Garland of Memories'
Keywords: R. Natarajan,B. Sengupto,A. L. Mudaliar,Farewell Party,Shanti Sengupto,
